name: String. Name of the gun.
color: Number. Color of the gun and bullets.
ammo: Number. Ammos to spawn when dropped from loot (crates, trees, etc.).
dual: Boolean. Whether or not the gun can be used in dual.
auto: Boolean. Whether or not the gun can fire continuously. Defaults to false.
length: Number. Gun length in game units.
droppable: Boolean. Whether the item can be dropped upon death,

normal.__comment: Default stats when no perks are active.

reload.bullets: Number. Bullets per reload. 0 or omitted to reload all.

delay.firing: Number. Delay between shots in milliseconds.
delay.burst: Number. Delay between secondary burst shots in milliseconds. If bursts is 0 or omitted, we don't care about this.

spread.still: Number. Degrees of spread when standing still.
spread.move: Number. Degrees of spread when moving.

normal.recoil: Number. Time required to get an accurate shot again. 0 or omitted to never.

bullet.damage: Number. Damage done by a bullet.
bullet.objDamage: Number. Damage done to obstacles. If omitted, defaults to 'damage'.
bullet.falloff: Number. Damage multiplier for every 100 units travelled.
bullet.speed: Number. Speed of bullet in units per second.
bullet.range: Array of 2 numbers. Minimum range and maximum range. 1 unit is radius of a player.
bullet.suppressed: Boolean. Whether bullet fades over time.
bullet.noClip: Boolean. Whether the bullet collides with stuff. Defaults to be false.

tracer.type: Number. Type of tracer, similar to color.
tracer.width: Number. Width of tracer in game units.

color.regular: String. Hex color of regular tracer.
color.saturated: String. Hex color of saturated tracer.
color.chambered: String. Hex color of chambered tracer.

visuals.animations: Array of string. Animation ID to play when shot.
